titleStmt.title: A true description of the mighty kingdoms of Japan and Siam written originally in Dutch by Francis Caron and Joost Schorten ; and novv rendred into English by Capt. Roger Manley.
Benschrijvinghe van het machtigh coninckrijcke Japan. English
titleStmt.author: Caron, François, 1600-1673.
Schouten, Joost.
Manley, Roger, Sir, 1626?-1688.

biblFull.extent: [8], 152 p., [2] leaves of folded plates : ill., folded map.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Broun and John de l'Ecluse ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Benschrijvinghe van het machtich coninckrijcke Japan.
The description of Japan is by Caron and that of Siam by Schouten.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
